sentences.en: Being lost in the wilderness for a week was an ordeal for me.
sentences.cn: 在荒野里迷路一星期对我来说真是一场磨难.

sentences.en: He spoke frankly about the ordeal.
sentences.cn: 他直率地讲出了苦难的经历。

sentences.en: He was beginning to wonder if he would survive the ordeal.
sentences.cn: 他开始怀疑自己能否熬过这场磨难。

sentences.en: Last night he relived his terrifying ordeal.
sentences.cn: 昨夜他又一次体验了那种可怕的折磨。

sentences.en: Mona remains unshaken by her ordeal and is matter-of-fact about her courage.
sentences.cn: 莫娜不为她经历的这场磨难所动，对自己表现出的勇气也态度淡然。

sentences.en: Once there we saw that the ordeal must have been great.
sentences.cn: 从前我们觉得严酷的考验一定是很伟大的。

sentences.en: Seated beside him, I bore the ordeal for two hours.
sentences.cn: 我坐在他旁边, 苦苦熬了两个钟头.

sentences.en: She described her agonising ordeal.
sentences.cn: 她描述了自己备受折磨的苦难经历。

sentences.en: She kept her cool and managed to get herself out of the ordeal.
sentences.cn: 她保持着冷静与克制，努力使自己走出了这次痛苦的经历。

sentences.en: She managed to keep her sanity throughout the ordeal.
sentences.cn: 在那场磨难中她始终保持神志正常.

sentences.en: She wouldn't want to put them through the ordeal of a huge ceremony.
sentences.cn: 她不想让他们参加大型仪式受罪。

sentences.en: Soon the whole terrifying ordeal would be over.
sentences.cn: 这场恐怖的磨难很快就会过去的。

sentences.en: Stopping only briefly to regain her composure, she described her agonising ordeal.
sentences.cn: 她只停顿了一小会儿让自己恢复平静，然后讲述了她无比痛苦的经历。

sentences.en: Teresa had a transplant in 1989 and was just recovering from that ordeal when she suffered a brain hemorrhage.
sentences.cn: 特雷莎在1989年做了一次移植手术，而正当她刚刚从那可怕的磨难中逐渐恢复时，又患了脑溢血。

sentences.en: The experience was a detestable ordeal, and it cured him of any ambitions to direct again.
sentences.cn: 那次经历是一次令人厌恶的煎熬，使得他放弃了任何再当导演的想法。

sentences.en: The former hostage is in remarkably good shape considering his ordeal.
sentences.cn: 想想人质曾遭受的折磨，获救后其身体状况已经是出奇地好了。

sentences.en: The hostages emerged from their ordeal unscathed .
sentences.cn: 各人质历尽磨难后安然生还。

sentences.en: The ordeal has affected both her mental and physical health.
sentences.cn: 痛苦的经历损害了她的身心健康。

sentences.en: They are to be spared the ordeal of giving evidence in court.
sentences.cn: 他们将免受出庭作证的难堪。

sentences.en: They manned themselves for an ordeal.
sentences.cn: 他们振奋精神迎接考验。

words.tran_cn: 折磨；严酷的考验；痛苦的经验

trans.tran_cn: 严峻的考验，苦难的经验，折磨，神判法
trans.tran_en: a terrible or painful experience that continues for a period of time
